reviewText: This is another good year for History detectives. They seemed to get a little more balanced than the previous years.
Title: History Detectives: Season 10

reviewText: This is a great show for all ages.  It's very entertaining and I've learned quite a few history facts and details I never knew!  Highly recommend.
Title: History Detectives: Season 10

reviewText: I learn so much by watching History detectives. Not your typical history show or your typical documentary. Fun, interesting and obscure facts come to light, as well as personal stories of those asking for History Detectives help.
Title: History Detectives: Season 10

reviewText: Some of the items they research are really exciting but others seem to be all about being politically correct. This is a common flaw with PBS and their misrepresentation of politics.
Title: History Detectives: Season 10

reviewText: We enjoy History Detectives - Season 10.  It is always fascinating to see how each detective approaches the challenge for the program.  The solutions are interesting and the stories are enjoyable.
Title: History Detectives: Season 10

reviewText: I enjoyed it and plan to watch more in this series. Seems well made and contained new information. Recommended and good.
Title: History Detectives: Season 10

reviewText: Have enjoyed this program on PBS and always interesting to see where and how the results have terminated.  So glad this is being offered here on Kindle Fire.
Title: History Detectives: Season 10

reviewText: I had not previously seen more than a part of this TV show.  I found that it was well presented and contained newinformation on many aspects of American life.  In the words of General McArthur, I Shall Return!
Title: History Detectives: Season 10

reviewText: Wonderful show. It's fascinating to watch the History Detectives uncover the truth about an item. Great show for kids. They will learn how to find things out and to question stories presented as fact. Critical skills now that some school systems have been reduced to teaching kids how to pass standardized tests.
Title: History Detectives: Season 10

reviewText: A great franchise. If you're a history buff and enjoy watching a little detective work...it doesn't get much better than this.
Title: History Detectives: Season 10

reviewText: Interesting subject matter is investigated. We enjoy it very much. Only needs more episodes to be complete. Where are the other 9 Seasons?
Title: History Detectives: Season 10

reviewText: Yes, it is good! But they need to release all the seasons! It was a very interesting one! Need to get it!
Title: History Detectives: Season 10

reviewText: Another great season of "History Detectives," who've proven that they are not satisfied with easy, dismissive answers. They delve deep.
Title: History Detectives: Season 10

reviewText: I love the fact that they dig until they come up with an answer. Researchers find people with great questions.
Title: History Detectives: Season 10

reviewText: I don't care what season this is, I love this show.  It is so fun to go on the journey to find the story behind an object.  These guys do a great job and make it fun and informative.  You learn things about everything from the Revolution to Woodstock or the Lunar Landing.  You never know on what adventure you will embark.  Take a trip to the past with the History Detectives!
summary: Take a trip to the past with the History Detectives!
Title: History Detectives: Season 10

reviewText: This is a family favorite.  I would love to see Amazon Prime put more seasons of this show on for all interested viewers.
Title: History Detectives: Season 10

reviewText: Very interesting.  They take things and trace them back to their start.  All sorts of things from found diaries to guitars and find their original owner and the story attached to each object.
Title: History Detectives: Season 10

reviewText: This is a fascinating series.  Would love to see some of the earlier seasons. I love this kind of program.
Title: History Detectives: Season 10

reviewText: After ten seasons, the History Detectives is still delivering great investigations that shine light on subjects ranging from Bob Dylan's first electric guitar to Civil War-era and Civil Rights-era artifacts.  Truly, this is quality educational television.
Title: History Detectives: Season 10

reviewText: This is reality TV the way it should be. It brings everyday history to life. It shows the research done by very knowledgeable people.I looked forward to  watching the program on OPB (Oregon Public Broadcasting)  and now I can watch a little of it through Amazon. Would love to see more seasons of the program. Think this series would appeal to all ages. History Detectives take family heirlooms and research their history to reveal if they really played a part in history or not. It is amazing that some of the items are still around.
Title: History Detectives: Season 10

reviewText: I Love History Detectives!!!!! The information is always interesting and thought provoking! I recommend watch this to any interested in history! Thanks!
Title: History Detectives: Season 10

reviewText: I highly recommend this TV show.  They do a great job of making history interesting.  I really value the way this show is done they put a lot of effort into the research.  It is very enjoyable to watch.  I highly recommend this series.
Title: History Detectives: Season 10

reviewText: I love this show!  It's a very personal kind of show with people wanting to know more about items handed down through family, found in garage sales, etc.  The items are thoroughly researched, which is interesting in itself, by knowledgeable experts.  It's like taking a trip into the past.
Title: History Detectives: Season 10

reviewText: History Detectives is a fun and educational program. Not only do you learn about the artifact being investigated, but you learn about events and the time period surrounding it. Often there are surprises along the way that make the investigation even more interesting. The producers do a great job of picking items that can be researched in depth and often times seem impossible to track. Yet, the detectives leave no stone unturned and find out more than one could imagine at the outset.
Title: History Detectives: Season 10

reviewText: Each episode is interesting. You will "get the story" on items that you may never have other access to. Watch this show.
Title: History Detectives: Season 10

reviewText: I really enjoy this series.  Just wonder how they pick their stories.  Good for anyone but those who enjoy history stuff will be intertained.
Title: History Detectives: Season 10

reviewText: Well ressearched and tied togetherr with a good script and shots to match.  not a boring history teacher at all.
Title: History Detectives: Season 10

reviewText: I all ways find these programs to be very much fun to  watch, I guess its  because I love learning new things.. this is a  great pbs show...
Title: History Detectives: Season 10

reviewText: Perfect for history lovers and researchers as a quick escape. Always easy to focus on and interesting to learn about history and how to research antiques.  Parallels my interest in researching history.  I always learn something.  This is one of my favorite shows.
summary: Easy escape that is always interesting
Title: History Detectives: Season 10

reviewText: I love the unusual things they are brought and then they find the information.  I wouldn't mind a job doing the research.
summary: A good way to study history
Title: History Detectives: Season 10
